page.title: 13Supernatural Llangunllo
page.content: There are many stories of supernatuaral happenings in this village. Sometimes they are invented to test the gullible; one, current for about 18 months, involves a man with cloven hooves and a tail lying in wait on a farm gate in the Dingle and sometimes they are based on local tragedies, the white clad woman who passes the pool where someone is said to have drowned herself for love. A more interesting tale, and much older, is that of the Wild Black Dog with Fiery Eyes which is said to haunt the Cross_Roads at Four Ashes. This story has been told for many years and not only to outsiders who may not understand Radnorshire deadpan humour.
